FuncDef: This command enables the use of the Diff-Serv backup Class-Type (CT), instead of the Diff-Serv main CT, to signal the LSP primary path when it fails and goes into retry. The Diff-Serv main CT is configured at the LSP level or at the primary path level using the following commands:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Diff-Serv Class Type number. One or more system forwarding classes can be mapped to a CT. Values-0 to 7, integer.
